    def test_validate_expected_error_while_execution_of_task_interlocks_with_date_property_and_task_start_trigger(
            self, user_group_creation, job_execution_by, users_list):

             process_data["properties"]["number_property"]: "100",

        self.job_obj.create_job()

        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01)
